txt.en: 'Did you see those Orcs at the cross-roads of Sudulthurkh, [placeholder]? They were pushing mine-carts along the road. I think they are carrying war-supplies eastward!\n\n'I cannot guess why... why would the Orcs of Moria wish to face the sun? I may never know the answer, but we should stop them, if we can.'
'I am glad you thinned their ranks, [placeholder]! The Dale will be safer, as will the road eastward.'
'The Orcs can be found just south of here, on the cross-roads of Sudulthurkh.'
You and Svanr saw a great number of Orcs pushing mine-carts at Sudulthurkh, clearly bearing war-supplies eastward.

Orcs can be found pushing mine-carts at the cross-roads of Sudulthurkh in Nud-melek, north of the great chasm.\n\nYou should defeat the war-mongering Orcs of Moria before they can wreak havoc upon the Dale.
Svanr can be found in a corner of the path just east of Sudulthurkh.\n\nYou should speak with Svanr.
